repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: This is a Dictionary of Tamil words with their French equivalent, by Beschi (U2), in a bound volume. It is comparable to BnF Indien 215, which appears to be a similar, if not the very same, text. It is preceded by a list a proverbs (U1).
Description by Neela Bhaskar based on the digital images available on Gallica.

supportDesc.foliation: Pagination 1-275 in Arabic numerals, top right margin, for U2, except first folio.

collation.desc: 1 folio = a kind of List of Proverbs in French. Written recto verso. With reference to pages in U2. Library foliation A.
3 folios = guard leaves. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

139 folios = Dictionary. 1 unfoliated/unpaginated folio (introduction/preface) + 138 folios with pagination 1-275. Last folio lists a few entries under the letter ya, that were likely forgotten earlier.
7 folios = guard leaves. No foliation. List of numbers on f6v and f7v.

supportDesc.condition: Very good state of preservation. Binding intact.

layoutDesc.layout: Arranged in Tamil alphabetical order. Two columns. Pages are numbered, but individual entries are not. Above each column is the letter-heading (e.g. Ak or Aṅ). Grantha characters are listed at the very end.

handNote.desc: Very neat hand. Lines drawn in pencil to guide the writing. Same hand throughout the document.

additions.desc: BnF old shelfmark in black pencil: Tamoul N° 210 (front cover, verso).
BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 210 (front cover, verso).
For each letter of the dictionary, reference is made to a folio (a page in fact). See p. 274.
Stamp BIBIBLIOTHEQUE ROYALE (U1, f[1]r and U2 p276v).

binding.p: Leather covers, seemingly bound by string.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to circa 1760 by Vinson in Vinson et al. (1866-). Not dated by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments).

acquisition.p: Unknown. Possibly a manuscript sent by the Jesuits of Pondicherry.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits ind iens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des man uscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 34, no. 210
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 51r, no. 210.

encodingDesc.p: puḷḷi not added. Letters as written in the manuscript.
